app_descript:
App Name: Windy.com

Brief: Windy.com is a comprehensive weather forecasting tool that excels in delivering high-quality, detailed weather information for a variety of interests and needs. Whether you're preparing for a severe weather event, planning an outing, or engaging in outdoor sports, Windy.com provides the latest weather data ensuring you're well-informed.
